cards.rules_text:
When Naki enters, draw a card.

Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. [i](To consume, sacrifice another creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard.)[/i]

Urban myth [i](Cast this spell only if you have ten or more nonland names among permanents you control and cards in your graveyard.)[/i]
You may put a permanent card from your hand or your graveyard onto the battlefield, then create two copies of it, except the copies aren't legendary.
